entry.title: Terra’s Luna Classic Gains Big as Binance Burns Untold Tokens
entry.summary: Traders are optimistic as they await official numbers from the major exchange.

entry.title: SEC Approach Is ‘Threatening the Entire Ecosystem’: Former CFTC Commissioner
entry.summary: Brian Quintenz said a better path would be possible “if the SEC was serious.”

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Musk and Dorsey’s Texts Leaked, Do Kwon Pleads (Further) Innocence
entry.summary: Also: Ukraine DAO helped form an Iran DAO to raise funds to support women’s opposition to the current regime.

entry.title: Coinbase Suffers ‘Major Outage’ for Customers With US Bank Accounts
entry.summary: The exchange has identified the problem and is working to address the issue.

entry.title: Multiple Blockchains Will Succeed, ‘But Not 20 or 30’: Fantom Foundation CEO
entry.summary: Despite crypto winter, Michael Kong sees a bright multi-chain future for Fantom, but knows that not all the blockchains out there can survive.

entry.title: How PussyDAO Is Using Solana NFTs to Sell Physical Underwear
entry.summary: The Web3 brand's vibe is "punk rock meets hyperfemininity," tapping NFTs that can be redeemed for apparel and other products.

entry.title: Bringing Institutions to Crypto: Christine Moy of Apollo, David Mercer of LMAX at SALT NY
entry.summary: Christine Moy of Apollo Global, formerly of JPMorgan, and David Mercer of LMAX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at SALT NY for a talk on institutional crypto investing and what hurdles remain to broader adoption amid the crypto bear market.

entry.title: Maple Finance Aims to Be the Shopify of Crypto Lending
entry.summary: Maple co-founder Sidney Powell says Maple is "giving you the tooling to run a lending business online" a la e-commerce giant Shopify's model.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin, Ethereum Escape Broader Market Slide
entry.summary: BTC and ETH are flat for the week, while other top coins suffered bigger losses and the crypto market fell back below $1 trillion.

entry.title: ‘Ethereum Killer’ Solana Suffers Another Major Outage
entry.summary: The popular blockchain has suffered a handful of outages and transaction stops this year, including a string of partial outages in January.

entry.title: SEC Must Turn Over Emails About Ethereum—But It Won’t Help Ripple, Lawyers Say
entry.summary: Amid an ongoing $1.3 billion lawsuit with Ripple, a judge has ordered the SEC to hand over internal emails regarding the regulatory status of Ethereum.

entry.title: Is Bitcoin Really Decoupling From Stocks? Experts Weigh In
entry.summary: The correlation between Bitcoin and the stock market has weakened over the past couple weeks. But has it decoupled? Here’s what the experts have to say.

entry.title: Paraguay Senators Reject President’s Bitcoin Mining Law Veto
entry.summary: Paraguayan lawmakers are keen on regulating Bitcoin mining in the South American country.

entry.title: SEC Charges Crypto Firms for Alleged Scam With 'Gold-Backed' Ethereum DIG Token
entry.summary: Now-defunct crypto firms have been accused of running an alleged pump-and-dump scam via the DIG token.

entry.title: CFTC Sues Founder of Crypto Exchange Digitex for Pumping Token, Failing to Register
entry.summary: The commission alleges in the lawsuit that Digitex has "never been registered with the Commission in any capacity."

entry.title: T-Mobile Parent Deutsche Telekom Launches Ethereum Validator, Staking Support
entry.summary: The telecommunications giant will allow customers to get involved in staking Ethereum.

entry.title: ICO Hype Man Ian Balina Launches GoFundMe to Tackle SEC Lawsuit
entry.summary: Crypto bro Balina wants money to fight the SEC “on behalf of the whole crypto community.” So far, he’s raised about a grand.

entry.title: Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs'
entry.summary: Brian Trunzo, metaverse lead at Polygon Studios, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 why he's bullish on metaverse fashion, how big brands are thinking about it, why the future of NFTs will be in gaming and not "right-click save JPEGs," and why he doesn't think the visual graphics of the metaverse need to dramatically improve necessarily.

entry.title: Telefónica Invests in Crypto Exchange, Launches Payments Pilot
entry.summary: Telefónica continues its move into crypto which already includes an NFT market and token, plus partnerships with Qualcomm, Unity, and Niantic.

entry.title: Coinbase, Crypto Stocks Plummet as Bitcoin Trades Sideways
entry.summary: Shares in Bitcoin-adjacent companies including Coinbase and Block have chalked up heavy losses at the opening bell Friday morning.

entry.title: Ernst & Young Wants to Be 'The Best on Earth at Ethereum' Says Firm's Blockchain Lead
entry.summary: Ernst & Young's global blockchain leader Paul Brody told Decrypt the company is "all-in" on public blockchains, particularly Ethereum.

entry.title: Uniswap Labs Eyes $200M in Fresh Funding: Report
entry.summary: New reports indicate that Uniswap Labs, the development team behind the eponymous DeFi exchange, is in talks for fresh funding.

entry.title: MicroStrategy on Hiring Hunt for Bitcoin Lightning Network Engineer
entry.summary: Cloud software company MicroStrategy has advertised a new job opening for a Bitcoin Lightning Network engineer.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey Told Elon Musk Twitter Should Be a Protocol 'Like Signal'
entry.summary: In a series of text messages, Elon Musk muses over potential permutations of the social network.

entry.title: Balcony DAO Is Fractionalizing Investment in a New Jersey Building as an NFT
entry.summary: Balcony DAO co-founder John Belitsky tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Balcony DAO is fractionalizing real estate investment using NFTs starting with 20 Third Avenue in Long Branch, NJ, and why it's waiting to launch its token as a registered security with the SEC.

entry.title: Fantom Foundation CEO: Multiple Blockchains Will Succeed—But Not 20 of Them
entry.summary: Fantom Foundation CEO Michael Kong tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how the Layer-1 blockchain competes with Ethereum and other chains, how it's a multi-chain future, how people misunderstood what the Ethereum merge was going to mean, and how to onboard more people into Web3.

entry.title: Why Izzy Howell Left Solana Derivatives Protocol Cypher to Launch an NFT Apparel Brand
entry.summary: Izzy Howell, a former core contributor at Solana derivatives protocol Cypher, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 what she's up to now: a streetwear and lifestyle brand called PussyDAO that will soon launch Solana NFTs tied to physical apparel.

entry.title: FTX's Sam Bankman-Fried Was 'Potentially Interested' in Buying Twitter with Elon Musk, Texts Claim
entry.summary: According to text messages revealed in legal proceedings, SBF was willing to contribute up to $5 billion toward acquiring the birdsite.

entry.title: Why Magic Eden Is Betting on NFTs Disrupting the Gaming Industry
entry.summary: On Decrypt’s gm podcast, Magic Eden CEO Jack Lu discussed the “paradigm shift” he sees ahead as gaming NFTs take hold.

entry.title: ETHW Surges as Binance Launches Ethereum Proof-of-Work Mining Pool
entry.summary: Binance warned that supporting ETHW on Binance Pool does not guarantee it will list the asset.

entry.title: Warner Music Group Launches Partnership with OpenSea
entry.summary: The first joint project will be an IP-generative ‘NFT Label Pass’ from Web3 startup Probably Nothing.

entry.title: 'Find a Path That Allows for Crypto Innovation': Coinbase US Policy Chief
entry.summary: Debate continued at Mainnet over the role of regulations and KYC in the crypto industry.

entry.title: Facebook, Instagram Users in US Can Now Share Ethereum, Flow and Polygon NFTs
entry.summary: Meta is letting all U.S. users connect a crypto wallet and display owned NFTs on either social app.

entry.title: Citadel's Ken Griffin: Investors Leaving Bitcoin, NFTs and Meme Stocks Is Good for Economy
entry.summary: The billionaire hedge fund manager thinks the "speculative bubble" has burst—and investors are moving on.

entry.title: Solana NFT Game Star Atlas Launches Playable Demo on Epic Games Store
entry.summary: Star Atlas just rolled out its first playable demo, plus its developer released tools to help other studios bring games to Solana.

entry.title: Coinbase Embodies ‘Predatory Junkyard That Is Crypto’: Enron Short-Seller Jim Chanos
entry.summary: Chanos pointed to Coinbase’s high operating costs and questioned whether the exchange could thrive in an environment of high-interest rates.

entry.title: Crypto Gaming Will 'Bring 100 Million People Into Web3': Framework Ventures Co-Founder
entry.summary: The ongoing crypto winter is the best time to build and invest, according to the San Francisco venture firm Framework Ventures.

entry.title: Crypto.com Targeted in Latest Round of Lazarus Group's Fake Job Scams
entry.summary: Crypto.com is now the second crypto exchange after Coinbase to be targeted by the hacking group Lazarus’ macOS malware scam.

entry.title: BNV Takes Paris Fashion Week Into the Metaverse With K-Pop Group Lightsum
entry.summary: A new collaboration between BNV, Weinsanto, and Lightsum marked another step into Web3 for the high-end fashion world.

entry.title: CFTC Chair Says Crypto Regulations Could Double Bitcoin Price
entry.summary: Behnam argued that Bitcoin could soar in a regulated market where institutional investors feel more comfortable wading into the industry.

entry.title: SEC Charges Crypto Firm Hydrogen Technology With Market Manipulation, Selling Unregistered Securities
entry.summary: The SEC alleges that Hydrogen has been involved in unregistered offers and sales of securities in the form of its Hydro token.

entry.title: Ethereum Merge Shows Crypto Is 'Getting Its Act Together': Eric Schmidt
entry.summary: Schmidt also said that if Chainlink can scale, it will be “a major contribution” to the tech industry.

entry.title: Someone Just Paid $4.5M for a CryptoPunks Ethereum NFT Despite Bear Market
entry.summary: It’s the fourth-highest CryptoPunks sale when measured in ETH, and a surprising pickup in a time of declining NFT sales.

entry.title: Meghan Heintz of Dune Analytics: Crypto Bear Market Makes the Scammers Move On
entry.summary: Meghan Heintz, data scientist at Dune Analytics, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Dune works, how its user-created data dashboards have a social element, the surprising benefit of the crypto bear market, and what she says to crypto skeptics.

entry.title: Stablecoin Markets Shift as Binance Begins USDC Conversions
entry.summary: Binance will no longer support competing stablecoins, including USDC, on its exchange. USDC’s market cap is down 5% since the announcement.

entry.title: Circle Expands USDC Stablecoin Support to Five New Blockchains
entry.summary: The company also announced a Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol to streamline the movement of USDC across networks.

entry.title: Prasanna Loganathar of Cake DeFi: Biggest Misconception About Crypto Is It's Less Safe Than TradFi
entry.summary: Prasanna Loganathar is the head of engineering at Cake DeFi, which is built atop DeFi Chain, a proof-of-stake network for dapps built on a fork of the Bitcoin blockchain. He tells Decrypt’s Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Mainnet 2022 (sponsored by DeFi Chain) about how DeFi Chain works, how it's possible to layer proof-of-stake on top of Bitcoin, and the biggest misconceptions about DeFi that he'd like to see go away in 2023.

entry.title: Polygon Co-Founder Talks Imminent Launch of zkEVM at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Polygon co-founder Mihailo Bjelic tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about why Polygon zkEVM will be the future of Ethereum scaling, how Polygon is "an un-opinionated platform" and how the Ethereum merge affected Polygon.

entry.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: Gaming Is Going to Bring 100 Million New People Into Web3
entry.summary: Framework Ventures co-founder Michael Anderson told Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022 why Framework is so bullish on blockchain gaming, NFTs in games, and how that's positioned to be the category that brings crypto to mainstream consumers.

entry.title: Jonas Surmann of DeFi Chain at Mainnet 2022: How DeFi Will Weather Crypto Winter
entry.summary: Jonas Surmann, ambassador for DeFi Chain, sponsor of the Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022, tells Decrypt’s Dan Roberts and Sander Lutz about why DeFi will weather the crypto winter, how DeFi Chain is building decentralized apps on top of the Bitcoin blockchain, and what could happen with regulation if the SEC views most DeFi tokens as securities.

entry.title: Microsoft's Blockchain Lead: 'Developers Keep Building in a Bear Market, They Don't Stop'
entry.summary: Microsoft's blockchain lead Yorke Rhodes tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Microsoft approaches Web3 and how it began its blockchain tooling with Ethereum but is now looking into working on other chains. "We think about it from a portfolio perspective, you're not focused on pushing one thing, you're focused on pushing a whole portfolio... we don't like to be kingmakers."

entry.title: Tiffany Huang of Magic Eden: 'Ethereum People Are Paying a Lot of Attention to Solana NFTs'
entry.summary: NFT marketplace Magic Eden content head Tiffany Huang tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Andrew Hayward in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Magic Eden's expansion to Ethereum has gone, how Solana NFTs have gained share of the overall NFT market, why she thinks even Ethereum people are paying more attention to Solana NFTs,

entry.title: Crypto Investor Matthew Graham: 'The LARPers Are Gone' Thanks to Bear Market
entry.summary: Sino Global Capital CEO Matthew Graham, a longtime crypto investor, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about investment choices during the bear market, DeFi growth prospects, how crypto needs to do a better job of "encouraging good actors and being vocal when people are doing something not sustainable."

entry.title: Cash App Crypto Lead: 'You'd Be Blind to Not See the Utility of Stablecoins'
entry.summary: Miles Suter, crypto lead at Block's Cash App, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about Cash App's new feature that uses the Bitcoin Lightning network, why he believes Bitcoin is "the global reserve currency of the future," why he dislikes the term "Bitcoin maximalist," and why Block is bullish on stablecoins.

entry.title: Time President Keith Grossman: 'NFTs Will Disrupt Any Industry That Lacks Transparency'
entry.summary: TIME President Keith Grossman tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how he brought Time into Web3 even as people asked him if he was crazy, the visceral feelings some people have against NFTs, what use cases for NFTs excite him beyond art, and where NFT memberships and rewards programs are going from here.

entry.title: Google Cloud's Web3 Lead at Mainnet 2022: The Problem With Crypto 'Purity Tests'
entry.summary: Rich Widmann, the Web3 lead at Google Cloud, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 how Google Cloud is trying to "build a giant bridge" between Web2 and Web3, and the problem with crypto "purity tests."

entry.title: Maple Finance CEO on Facilitating $300M in Loans to Bitcoin Miners
entry.summary: Sidney Powell, co-Founder and CEO of Maple Finance, joins Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to discuss its unique role in the lending space, why Bitcoin miners are willing to pay up to 20% for a loan, and how it's building the tooling to let any business spin up a crypto credit facility.

entry.title: Immunefi's Alejandro Muñoz-McDonald: Bug Bounties Will Become Core Security Model of Web3
entry.summary: Alejandro Muñoz-McDonald, a smart contracts engineer at Immunefi, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Immunefi's bug bounties work, how to recruit more smart coders into Web3 security, and why bug bounties should not be seen as "optional" for blockchain platforms.

entry.title: Steve Newcomb of zkSync: 2023 Will Be 'Zero-Knowledge Season'
entry.summary: Steve Newcomb, chief product officer of zkSync, tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about why "zero knowledge" and EVM-compatibility matters so much for DeFi scaling solutions now. He also predicts the biggest crypto news of 2023 will be "the great port" to zk-proofs.

entry.title: Euler Labs COO: DeFi Lending 'Duopoly' of Compound and Aave Invites Competition
entry.summary: Brandon Neal, COO of Euler Labs, told Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022 about how Euler approached the Ethereum merge, how to onboard more people into crypto and DeFi, and how Euler competes with Compound and Aave, the leaders in the DeFi borrowing and lending space.
